bitchat runs in the background to maintain mesh network connections with nearby devices. Battery optimization can interrupt these connections, causing messages to be delayed or missed.\n\nDisabling battery optimization ensures reliable peer-to-peer messaging.
Note: You can change this setting later in Android Settings > Apps > bitchat > Battery
Your device doesn\'t require battery optimization settings. bitchat will run normally.
